resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103648</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103648</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202777</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Oral Social Sciences through Personal Narratives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundsozialwissenschaften durch persönliche 
Darstellungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les sciences sociales orales par des récits 
personnels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências sociais orais com as narrativas 
pessoais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze sociali orali con le descrizioni 
personali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προφορικές κοινωνικές επιστήμες μέσω των προσωπικών 
αφηγημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias sociales orales con narrativas 
personales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students apply their knowledge of story elements to art and literature of the 1950s by developing a story, comprehending someone else's story, and diagramming the five elements of plot. Students will then create, revise, edit, and publish their own personal narrative.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer tragen ihr Wissen der 
Geschichteelemente an der kunst und Literatur der fünfziger Jahre 
auf, indem sie eine Geschichte entwickeln begreifen, jemand anderes 
Geschichte, und die fünf Elemente des Plots diagramming. 
Kursteilnehmer dann erstellen, verbessern, bearbeiten und 
veröffentlichen ihre eigene persönliche Darstellung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants appliquent leur connaissance des 
éléments d'histoire à l'art et la littérature des années 50 en 
développant une histoire, en comprenant quelqu'un d'autre histoire, 
et diagramming les cinq éléments du traçage. Les étudiants 
alors créeront, mettront à jour, éditeront, et éditeront leur 
propre récit personnel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aplicam seu conhecimento de 
elementos da história à arte e literatura dos 1950s desenvolvendo 
uma história, compreendendo alguma outra pessoa história, e 
diagramming os cinco elementos do lote. Os estudantes então 
criarão, revisarão, editarão, e publicarão sua própria narrativa 
pessoal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi applicano la loro conoscenza degli 
elementi di storia all'arte e la letteratura degli anni 50 sviluppando
una storia, comprendendo qualcun'altro storia e diagramming i cinque 
elementi del diagramma. Gli allievi allora creeranno, 
modificheranno, editeranno e pubblicheranno la loro propria 
descrizione personale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές εφαρμόζουν τη γνώση τους στοιχείων 
ιστορίας στην τέχνη και λογοτεχνίας της δεκαετίας του '50 με την 
ανάπτυξη μιας ιστορίας, την κατανόηση της ιστορίας κάποιου 
άλλου, και τα πέντε στοιχεία της πλοκής. Οι σπουδαστές θα 
δημιουργήσουν έπειτα, θα αναθεωρήσουν, θα επιμεληθούν, και θα 
δημοσιεύσουν το προσωπικό αφήγημά τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aplican su conocimiento de los 
elementos de la historia al arte y la literatura de los años 50 
desarrollando una historia, comprendiendo a algún otro historia, y 
diagramming los cinco elementos del diagrama. Los estudiantes 
después crearán, revisarán, corregirán, y publicarán su propia 
narrativa personal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MARY MAGEE
FN:MARY MAGEE
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103648</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

      <location>
